tool_description: Performs comprehensive availability check for a single domain with detailed information including pricing, expiration, and registration options.

domain_name.description: Complete domain name including TLD to check

check_backorder.description: Whether to check backorder availability for unavailable domains

error_messages: Invalid domain name: Provide a complete domain name with TLD (e.g., example.com).
Domain validation failed: Domain name doesn't meet DNS naming standards.
Registrar API error: Unable to connect to domain availability service.
Unsupported TLD: The top-level domain is not supported for availability checking.
usage: Provide domain_name for detailed availability check. Enable include_pricing for cost information and check_backorder for expired domain monitoring options.

is_available.description: Whether the domain is available for registration

status.description: Detailed availability status (available, registered, reserved, premium, etc.)

registration_price.description: Cost to register domain for one year

is_premium.description: Whether this is a premium domain
